head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CUMMINS, JAMES, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CUMMINS, JAMES, M.D.

block.p: CUMMINS-James, M.D. Of Bedminster, NJ died on September 16, 2000. Beloved ''Dr. Jim'', surgeon on hospital ship, Refuge; served in U.S. Navy during World War II and Korean War; rank of Commander. General and thoracic surgeon at Morristown Memorial Hospital. Graduate of Fordham University, Georgetown University School of Medicine & member of American College of Surgeons. Survived by wife, Dr. Ella Cummins, children, Densey Jovonen, Jim Cummins, Dr. Tom Cummins and Candace Riegelhaupt, grandchildren Erik, Justina, James, Ian, Loren, Rebecca and Alexandra, great-grandchildren, Camilla and Nickalas and brothers, Dr. Mitchell Cummins, Tom Cummins, Esq. and Dr. Edward Cummins. A memorial service will be held at St. John's on the Mountain in Bernardsville, New Jersey at 11 AM on Saturday, September 23. In lieu of flowers, send contributions to Morristown Memorial Hospital.

A memorial service will be held at St. John's on the Mountain in Bernardsville, New Jersey at 11 AM on Saturday, September 23. In lieu of flowers, send contributions to Morristown Memorial Hospital.
